mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PWD, VEHICLE_ID, EMAIL, PHONENUM) VALUES(#{memId},#{memName},#{memPwd},#{vehicleId},#{email},#{phoneNum})
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PWD, VEHICLE_ID, EMAIL, PHONENUM, STATUS, LAST_LOGIN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID= #{memId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = CASE WHEN SYSDATE - LAST_LOGIN >= 30 THEN 'H' ELSE STATUS END, LAST_LOGIN = CASE WHEN SYSDATE - LAST_LOGIN < 30 THEN SYSDATE WHEN LAST_LOGIN IS NULL THEN SYSDATE ELSE LAST_LOGIN END WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}

UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NAME = #{memName}, VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONENUM = #{phoneNum}, STATUS = 'Y', LAST_LOGIN = CASE WHEN SYSDATE - LAST_LOGIN >=30 THEN SYSDATE ELSE LAST_LOGIN END WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
